# Nmap 


```{image} https://nmap.org/images/sitelogo.png 
:width: 200px 
:align: center 
```

## Description 

Nmap ("Network Mapper") is a free and open source utility for network discovery and security auditing. 

Home page for this solution: https://nmap.org/
